front.title: RTP Payload Format for Standard apt-X and Enhanced apt-X Codecs

abstract.t: This document specifies the payload format for packetization of audio data encoded with the Standard apt-X or Enhanced apt-X audio coding algorithms into the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP).The payload format supports transmission of multiple related audio channels per payload. This document also describes the use of the Standard apt-X and Enhanced apt-X coding algorithms in conjunction with the Session Description Protocol (SDP).
